text: visvasiccavare, ninnal allahuvinre sahayikalavuka? maryaminre makan isa havarikaleat ceadiccapeale: "daivamargattil enne sahayikkanarunt?” havarika 1l parannu: "nannalunt allahuvinre margattil sahayikalayi.” annane israyel makkalil oruvibhagam visvasikkukayum marrearu vibhagam avisvasikkukayum ceytu. pinne, visvasiccavarkku nam avarute satrukkale turattanulla karutt nalki. annane avar vijayikalavukayum ceytu
